title: Momentum - Falling brick explodes into 2 pieces

content.question: What is the speed of the other fragment immediately after the explosion?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of 2 g D, end root" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>D</mi></msqrt></math>
<math alttext="the square root of 4 g D, end root" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mn>4</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>D</mi></msqrt></math>
<math alttext="the square root of 8 g D, end root" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mn>8</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>D</mi></msqrt></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of 8 g D, end root" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mn>8</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>D</mi></msqrt></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
